name: Charlie's Grill & Pizza
text:
Meal Deals
Big Breakfast: $5.00

Broccoli Soup & Sandwich (BLT, Club, Denver, Western): $5.00

Cheeseburger/Hamburger Nips: $5.00

Charlie Burger and Fries: $7.00

8" Pizzas: $5.00 (Add wings for $13.00)

Fish Burger and Fries: $8.00

Fish Special: $10.00 (Choice of fresh cut fries/crinkle fries/mashed potato, comes with coleslaw, lemon, and tartar)

All Day Breakfast Menu

(Except Fridays, served until 11 AM)

The Big Breakfast: $7.99 Includes 2 eggs, 2 slices of toast, breakfast potatoes (choice of 3 bacon, 2 ham, 2 bologna, or 3 breakfast sausage) with a coffee & 1 refill.

Cheese Omelette: $4.50 / $6.75 Served with breakfast potatoes & toast.

Ham & Cheese Omelette: $5.25 / $7.50 Served with breakfast potatoes & toast.

Everything Omelette: $7.50 / $10.25 Served with breakfast potatoes & toast.

Toasted Egg Sandwich: $4.00 With bacon or ham: $5.50

Toasted Western: $6.00 With bacon, green onion, & green peppers.

Toasted Denver: $6.00 With ham & green onions.

Pancakes: $5.75

French Toast: $5.75

Porridge & Toast: $5.75

Toast: $3.50

1 Egg: $2.50 / 2 Eggs: $3.50

Bacon, Ham, Bologna, Sausage, or Breakfast Sausage: $3.75

Lunch
House Favourites

Charlie Burger: $10.50 A 6oz patty with bacon, tomato, lettuce, cheese, mustard, ketchup, relish, & mayo. Served with fries.

J&W Clubhouse: $10.50 A triple decker sandwich with a hamburger patty, onion, bacon, lettuce, tomato, cheese, & mayo. Served with fries.

Burgers All burgers are topped with mustard, ketchup, relish, onions, lettuce, tomatoes & mayo.

Hamburger: $4.75 / With fries: $7.75

Cheeseburger: $5.25 / With fries: $8.00

Bacon Cheeseburger: $6.75 / With fries: $9.75

Hamburger Nip: $8.25

Cheeseburger Nip: $8.75

Cold Sandwiches Add cheese to any sandwich for 25 cents.

Turkey Salad: $5.00 The following are served with lettuce & mayo.

Turkey: $5.00

Roast Beef: $5.00

Ham: $5.00

Bologna: $5.00

Hot Sandwiches

Hot Beef/Turkey Sandwich with Fries: $8.75

Hot Hamburger with Fries: $8.75

Clubhouse Sandwich with Fries: $9.50 / Without fries: $7.25

BLT with Fries: $8.75 / Without fries: $5.75

Basket of Chicken Fingers (3): $7.75 / Extra fingers: $2.00 each

Chicken Fingers (3) with Fries: $9.50 / Extra fingers: $2.00 each

Grilled Cheese: $4.50 / With fries: $8.00

Grilled Cheese with Ham/Bacon: $6.00 / With fries: $10.00

Hamburger Mashed with Green Onion: $7.75

Hamburger Steak with Potato, Fried Onion & Gravy: $9.00

Extras

Complete or add to your meal with these extras.

Gravy: $1.00

Hot Dog: $4.00

Hamburger Patty: $2.00

Soup of the Day

Appetizers
Charlie's Famous Pizza:

8" Pizza (1 topping): $6.50

12" Pizza (2 toppings): $12.00

14" Pizza (2 toppings): $12.00

XL Pizza (2 toppings): $18.25

Cheese Toast: $2.95

Poutine: $6.25

French Fries: $3.50

Gravy: $0.95

Onion Rings: $5.25

Mushroom Caps: $5.00

Potato Skins: $6.00

Topped with Green Onion & Bacon: $7.00

Mozza Sticks: $6.00

Tossed Salad: $5.00, with Chicken: $7.00

Caesar Salad: $6.25, with Chicken: $8.25

Charlie's Platter: $17.25

Cheese Toast, Onion Rings, Mushroom Caps, Wings, Mozza Sticks, Chicken Strips

Nachos:

Charlie's Nacho & Cheese Special: $9.75

Nachos & Cheese: $7.25

Additional Toppings (Green Peppers, Green Onion, Mushrooms, Tomato, Olives, Ground Beef, Bacon, Jalapeño): $1.50/topping

Pound of Wings: $10.25

Served with Carrots, Celery, & Ranch.

Choose from a variety of awesome sauces.

Famous Pickerel Dinner
Deep Fried or Pan Fried Pickerel:

With choice of potato, served with coleslaw, lemon & tartar: $11.99 (Friday only).

Extra Single Filet of Fish: $8.00

With soup or salad: $14.99

Extra Single Filet of Fish: $8.00

Kids & Seniors
Breakfast:

Includes 1 egg, 1 slice of toast, choice of 2 bacon, 1 ham, 1 sausage, 1 bologna, or 2 breakfast sausages: $4.75

Pancakes: $4.75

French Toast: $4.75

Lunch:

Hot Dog with Fries: $5.75

Pogo with Fries: $5.75

Chicken Fingers with Fries (2 fingers): $5.75

Grilled Cheese with Fries: $5.75, without Fries: $3.50

Fries: $4.00, with Gravy: $4.25

Beverages
Coffee/Tea (with 1 refill only): $2.00

Pop (can): $1.75

White/Chocolate Milk (large): $1.75

Apple/Orange Juice (large): $1.75

From the Bar
Domestic/Imported Beer: $4.75

Red/White Wine: $4.75

Bar Shots: $5.25

Coolers: $5.50
